description.value: You call out a desperate wish to the stars to save a friend. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Breath of Life] as an innate arcane spell, which you can cast once per day only while in sentinel form. Interceding in such a direct way temporarily exhausts your constellation's magic, causing you to revert from your sentinel form once the spell is cast.
